headline: What Recent AI Deals And Analyst Revisions Mean For BlackRock's Story And Valuation
summary: Analysts have nudged their fair value estimate for BlackRock slightly lower, from about US$1,319.33 to roughly US$1,305.93, after fine tuning assumptions around long term revenue growth and the discount rate used in their models. That small trim reflects a blend of optimism about BlackRock’s growth drivers with a bit more caution on how much upside is already reflected in current expectations. Stay with this article to see how these kinds of measured adjustments shape the ongoing narrative...

headline: Coinbase CEO, Brian Armstrong: Tokenized Stocks Are Coming Faster Than You Think
summary: In early 2025, Larry Fink, the CEO of BlackRock, one of the world’s largest asset manager, said tokenization would be a $1T-industry by the end of the decade. Roughly a year later, billions worth of assets, mostly cash and US Treasuries, have been tokenized on leading chains, mainly Ethereum. Now, ...
